name: Behold The Moon
description:
<>  A solo project and an entry for the Mini Jam 130: Lunar. <>

Made within the 72 hours restriction.

Following the theme of Lunar and limitation of 10 seconds.

Every 10 seconds you must complete a minigame in order to avoid losing.

As you get higher in score some changes will happen to the game.

Post any feedback and your high scores below in the comments.
